content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime location and modern facilities of this apartment, I believe the initial price proposed might be slightly higher than necessary. To start the negotiation, I would be comfortable agreeing to a rental price of 650 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price you proposed is too low given the quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
